name: Brick Out Candy Online Free Game
name_original: Brick Out Candy Online Free Game
description:
Brick Out Candy Online is a fun game where you can drop the bricks to get the candy. 

You play as a character who starts with nothing and must collect bricks to get candy. There are different levels in the game where you must find specific bricks to get the candy, so make sure you keep an eye out! The game is played by matching candy colors with the brick that goes next. The player who collects the most candy in a given time period wins.    

The object of the game is to drop as many bricks as possible without getting hit by the fire. The more bricks you Drop, the higher your score will be. There are five different levels in this game that can be played and each one has a new challenge for you to overcome.
